contents: The world needs different kinds of minds to work together.
author: Temple Grandin

contents: Everybody is a genius. But if you judge a fish by its ability to climb a tree, it will live its whole life believing that it is stupid.
author: Albert Einstein

contents: You have to be odd to be number one.
author: Dr. Seuss

contents: It’s not that I’m so smart, it’s just that I stay with problems longer.
author: Albert Einstein

contents: You don’t have to control your thoughts. You just have to stop letting them control you.
author: Dan Millman

contents: Normal is not something to aspire to, it’s something to get away from.
author: Jodie Foster

contents: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
author: Steve Jobs

contents: If you’re always trying to be normal, you will never know how amazing you can be.
author: Maya Angelou

contents: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
author: Thomas Edison
